	| Открыть попап
</button>

<div class="PopupOrigin">
	<section class="Popup -inContent" id="popupCreateWebsite">
		<div class="Popup__header">
			<h1 class="Popup__title">Heading</h1>
			<button type="button" class="Popup__closer do-popupCloser">
				+icon("cross")
			</button>
		</div>
		<div class="Popup__body">

			| ...

		</div>
		<div class="Popup__footer flex gap-3">
			<button type="button" class="Button do-popupCloser">Отмена</button>
			<button type="button" class="Button -primary do-popupCloser">Создать</button>
		</div>
	</section>
</div>
